articles.title: Dhanteras: Why India's Diwali gold rush is different this year - BBC
articles.description: Soaring gold prices have dented jewellery demand but Indians are not ready to give up on the metal yet.
articles.content:
More Indians are choosing buying gold for investment purposes this festive season
Ahead of the Hindu festival of Diwali, the jewellery market in Indian capital Delhi's vibrant Lajpat Nagar neighbour… [+5647 chars]
